title: Schema for 1:1 Anforderung-to-Kontrolle Mapping
description: Defines a structure for mapping requirements (ED2023-like IDs) to controls (GPP-like IDs) and listing unmapped items.

mapping.description: A 1:1 map where keys are ED2023 requirements and values are GPP controls.

unmapped_gpp.description: List of GPP control IDs that were not mapped to any ED2023 requirement.

unmapped_ed2023.description: List of ED2023 requirement IDs that were not mapped to any GPP control.
